caption.p: Inhibition on lipid peroxidation of A. virginicus extracts. Different letters indicate significant differences at p < 0.05. LPI, lipid peroxidation inhibition; T-Anvi, total crude extract; H-Anvi, hexane extract; E-Anvi, ethyl acetate extract; B-Anvi, butanol extract; W-Anvi, water extract; BHT, butylated hydroxytoluene.
